mapper.update: update NOTICE set NOT_TITLE = #{NOT_TITLE}, NOT_CONTENT = #{NOT_CONTENT}, NOT_REDATE = date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') where 1 = 1 and NOT_NO = #{NOT_NO};
mapper.select: select ADM_ID , ADM_NAME , ADM_PW from ADMIN;

select TRIM(BOTH "NO" FROM NOT_NO) as "NOT_NO" , NOT_TITLE , NOT_CONTENT , date_format(ifnull(NOT_REDATE, NOT_DATE), '%Y-%m-%d') as "DATE" from NOTICE where 1 = 1
and NOT_TITLE like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
and NOT_NO like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
order by cast(trim(leading 'NO' from NOT_NO) as unsigned) desc;
select concat('NO', NOT_NO) as "NOT_NO" , NOT_TITLE , NOT_CONTENT , date_format(ifnull(NOT_REDATE, NOT_DATE) , '%Y-%m-%d') as "DATE" from NOTICE where 1 = 1 and NOT_NO = #{NOT_NO};

select STORE_NO , STORE_NAME , STORE_CATEGORY , STORE_TEL , STORE_LOCATION , OWN_NO from STORE where 1 = 1
and STORE_NO like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
and STORE_NAME like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
and ( STORE_TEL like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%") or STORE_CATEGORY like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%") or STORE_LOCATION like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%") )
order by cast(trim(leading 'ST' from STORE_NO) as unsigned) desc;

select O.OWN_NO , O.OWN_ID , O.OWN_EMAIL , concat(substr(O.OWN_TEL,1,3), '-' ,substr(O.OWN_TEL,4,4), '-' ,substr(O.OWN_TEL,8,4)) as OWN_TEL , concat(substr(O.OWN_CRN,1,3), '-' ,substr(O.OWN_CRN,4,2),'-' ,substr(O.OWN_CRN,6,5)) as OWN_CRN , S.STORE_NO , S.STORE_NAME , S.STORE_LOCATION , S.STORE_CATEGORY , I.PHOTO_NO , I.PHOTO_NAME , S.STORE_TEL , concat(substr(S.STORE_ST,1,2), ':', substr(S.STORE_ST,3,2)) as STORE_ST , concat(substr(S.STORE_ET,1,2), ':', substr(S.STORE_ET,3,2)) as STORE_ET , S.STORE_INFO , S.STORE_PLUS from OWNER O join STORE S on O.OWN_NO = S.OWN_NO join STORE_IMAGE I on S.STORE_NO = I.STORE_NO where 1 = 1 and I.PHOTO_TYPE = 'SU1' and S.STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};

select CUS_NO , CUS_ID , CUS_NICK , CUS_NAME , ifnull((case when CUS_GENDER = 'F' then '여' when CUS_GENDER = 'M' then '남' else CUS_GENDER end), '미등록') as CUS_GENDER , ifnull(concat(substr(CUS_BIRTH,1,4), '.', substr(CUS_BIRTH,5,2), '.', substr(CUS_BIRTH,7,8)), '(미등록)') as CUS_BIRTH , ifnull(concat(substr(CUS_TEL,1,3), '-' ,substr(CUS_TEL,4,4), '-' ,substr(CUS_TEL,8,4)), '(미등록)') as CUS_TEL , CUS_EMAIL , date_format(ifnull(CUS_REDATE, CUS_DATE), '%Y-%m-%d') as "DATE" from CUSTOMER where 1=1
and CUS_NAME like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
and CUS_ID like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
and CUS_NICK like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
and ( CUS_GENDER like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%") or CUS_BIRTH like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%") or CUS_TEL like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%") or CUS_EMAIL like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%") )
and CUS_NO like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
order by cast(trim(leading 'CU' from CUS_NO) as unsigned) desc;

select SREP_NO , CUS_NO , STORE_NO , STORE_NAME , SREP_TITLE , SREP_CONTENT , date_format(SREP_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as "DATE" , SREP_PROCESS from STORE_REPORT where 1 = 1
and SREP_TITLE like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
and STORE_NAME like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
and SREP_NO like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
order by cast(trim(leading 'SR' from SREP_NO) as unsigned) desc;

select SR.SREP_NO , C.CUS_NO , C.CUS_NAME , S.STORE_NO , S.STORE_NAME , SR.SREP_TITLE , SR.SREP_FILE , SR.SREP_CONTENT , date_format(SR.SREP_DATE, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 %H시 %i분') as "DATE" , SR.SREP_PROCESS from STORE_REPORT SR join CUSTOMER C on SR.CUS_NO = C.CUS_NO join STORE S on SR.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO where 1 = 1 and SR.CUS_NO = #{CUS_NO} and SR.STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO} and SR.SREP_NO = #{SREP_NO};

select CREP_NO , REV_NO , OWN_NO , CREP_TITLE , STORE_NAME , CREP_CONTENT , date_format(CREP_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as "DATE" , CREP_PROCESS from REVIEW_REPORT where 1 = 1
and CREP_TITLE like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
and CREP_NO like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
and OWN_NO like concat("%",#{searchValue},"%")
order by cast(trim(leading 'RR' from CREP_NO) as unsigned) desc;

select CR.CREP_NO , R.REV_NO , CR.OWN_NO , CR.CREP_TITLE , CR.STORE_NAME , CR.CREP_CONTENT , date_format(CREP_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as "CRDATE" , CR.CREP_PROCESS , R.REV_CONTENT , R.REV_SCORE , date_format(R.REV_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as "RDATE" from REVIEW_REPORT CR join REVIEW R on CR.REV_NO = R.REV_NO where 1 = 1 and CR.CREP_NO = #{CREP_NO} and CR.REV_NO = #{REV_NO} and CR.OWN_NO = #{OWN_NO};

select R.REV_NO , C.CUS_NO , C.CUS_NICK , S.STORE_NAME , R.REV_CONTENT , date_format(R.REV_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as "REV_DATE" from REVIEW R join CUSTOMER C on R.CUS_NO = C.CUS_NO join STORE S on R.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO where 1 = 1 order by cast(trim(leading 'RV' from REV_NO) as unsigned) desc;

select R.REV_NO , R.REV_CONTENT , date_format(R.REV_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as "REV_DATE" , R.REV_SCORE , R.REV_IMAGE , R.CUS_NO , R.CUS_NICK , S.STORE_NO from REVIEW R join STORE S on R.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO where 1 = 1 and R.REV_NO = #{REV_NO};

select R.REV_NO , R.STORE_NO , S.STORE_NAME , C.COM_NO , C.COM_CONTENT , date_format(C.COM_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as "COM_DATE" from REVIEW R join STORE S on R.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO join COMMENT C on R.REV_NO = C.REV_NO where 1 = 1 and R.REV_NO = #{REV_NO};
